questions: What is the theme of the poem ‘Dust of Snow’?
Explain the main idea of ‘Dust of Snow’.
What message does ‘Dust of Snow’ convey?
2_marks.ideal_answer: The theme of the poem ‘Dust of Snow’ by Robert Frost is that small, seemingly insignificant moments in nature can have a profound impact on one's mood and thoughts.

questions: Explain the theme of ‘A Letter to God’.
What lesson does ‘A Letter to God’ teach?
What is the main message of ‘A Letter to God’?
3_marks.ideal_answer: The theme of ‘A Letter to God’ revolves around faith and trust in God. The story highlights the simplicity of Lencho’s belief in divine help, emphasizing the idea that true faith remains unshaken even in difficult times.
